   6.116.084a na paryadevan vidhavā na ca vyālakṛtaṃ bhayam	6.116.084a na paryadevan viDavA na ca vyAla kRtam Bayam
   6.116.084c na vyādhijaṃ bhayaṃ vāpi rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati	6.116.084d na vyADi jam Bayam vA api rAme rAjyam praSAsati
   6.116.085a nirdasyur abhaval loko nānarthaḥ kaṃ cid aspṛśat	6.116.085a nirdasyuH aBavat lokaH na anarTaH kam cit aspRSat 
   6.116.085c na ca sma vṛddhā bālānāṃ pretakāryāṇi kurvate	6.116.085d na ca sma vRdDAH bAlAnAm pretakAryANi kurvate
   6.116.086a sarvaṃ muditam evāsīt sarvo dharmaparo 'bhavat	6.116.086a sarvam muditam eva AsIt sarvaH Darma paraH aBavat 
   6.116.086c rāmam evānupaśyanto nābhyahiṃsan parasparam	6.116.086d rAmam eva anupaSyantaH na aByahiMsan parasparam
   6.116.087a āsan varṣasahasrāṇi tathā putrasahasriṇaḥ	6.116.087aH Asan varza sahasrANi taTA putra sahasriNaH
   6.116.087c nirāmayā viśokāś ca rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati	6.116.087c nirAmayAH viSokAH ca rAme rAjyam praSAsati
   6.116.088a nityapuṣpā nityaphalās taravaḥ skandhavistṛtāḥ	6.116.088a nitya puzpAH nitya PalAH taravaH skanDa vistRtAH
   6.116.088c kālavarṣī ca parjanyaḥ sukhasparśaś ca mārutaḥ	6.116.088d kAla varzI ca parjanyaH suKa sparSaH ca mArutaH
   6.116.089a svakarmasu pravartante tuṣṭhāḥ svair eva karmabhiḥ	6.116.089a sva karmasu pravartante tuzWAH svEH eva karmaBiH
   6.116.089c āsan prajā dharmaparā rāme śāsati nānṛtāḥ	6.116.089t Asan prajAH Darma parAH rAme SAsati na anRtAH
   6.116.090a sarve lakṣaṇasaṃpannāḥ sarve dharmaparāyaṇāḥ	6.116.090a sarve lakzaNa saMpannAH sarve Darma parAyaNAH
   6.116.090c daśavarṣasahasrāṇi rāmo rājyam akārayat	6.116.090t daSa varza sahasrANi rAmaH rAjyam akArayat
